paragraphs.name: 9b42
paragraphs.text: The rest of this blog post is worthless if you don’t make sleep a priority. Who cares if you wake up at 5 o’clock A.M. if you went to bed three hours earlier?

It was social and cultural to live our lives on other people’s terms just one generation ago. And many millennials are perpetuating this process simply because it’s the only worldview we’ve been taught.
paragraphs.name: f998

paragraphs.text: Your goals should be written down — short term and long term. Taking just a few minutes to read your life vision puts your day into perspective.
You may use stimulants to compensate, but that isn’t sustainable. In the long-run, your health will fall apart. The goal needs to be long-term sustainability.
paragraphs.name: b92c

paragraphs.text: You get to decide. You must decide — because if you don’t, someone else will. Indecision is a bad decision.

paragraphs.name: 7fc6
paragraphs.text: Ordinary people seek entertainment. Extraordinary people seek education and learning. It is common for the world’s most successful people to read at least one book per week. They are constantly learning.
As Professor Harold Hill has said — “You pile up enough tomorrows, and you’llfind you are left with nothing but a lot of empty yesterdays.”
paragraphs.name: 90d0
